title: ‘Grandma hug for the win’: Grandmother finds wholesome strategy to put her 14-year-old grandson's bully in his place, teenagers express their gratitude
description: It's not easy being a kid, and sometimes a kid having a rough time can lash out at other kids who aren't having as hard of a time as them. That is where bullying comes from. What do you do if you see a child in your life getting bullied? Well, in the case of this Reddit story, you just have to call your grandma! We find petty revenge stories online all the time, but this one is definitely the most wholesome. Here we see a grandmother coming to the rescue of her 14-year-old grandson. She writes that they have always had a strong and healthy bond and she very much enjoys spending time with him. Even now as a teenager, they are close. So when she went to his sport event, he was extremely happy to see her! He went and gave her a big happy hug and that's when his bully decided to strike. The bully started to tease him for hugging his own grandma. So what did the grandma do? She called the bully over in front of everyone because with all the ruckus he was causing, it was obvious he needed a grandma hug too! It really put him in his place and all of the other kids he bullied where happy to see this grandma show the bully what's up. Read the entire wholesome showdown below!
author: Elna McHilderson
